trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls used for editing the properties, layout, appearance, and behavior of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles usados para editar as propriedades, layout, aparência e comportamento de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controles.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPartCollection class is a read-only collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, typically used by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone to track the set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls contained by the zone.
trans-unit.target: A classe EditorPartCollection é uma coleção somente leitura de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles, normalmente usados por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona para controlar o conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles contidos pela zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and a user selects a control to edit, the editing process begins.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma página de Web Parts entra em modo de edição, e um usuário seleciona um controle para editar, começa o processo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The zone creates a new EditorPartCollection object consisting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls contained by the zone.
trans-unit.target: A zona cria um novo objeto de EditorPartCollection consiste de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles contidos pela zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: At various phases in the editing process, the zone accesses the EditorPartCollection object to save or retrieve property values between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: Em várias fases do processo de edição, a zona acessa o objeto EditorPartCollection para salvar ou recuperar valores de propriedade entre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles na coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar o que está sendo editado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: You can create an EditorPartCollection collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar uma coleção de EditorPartCollection de controles para seu próprio uso programático se, por exemplo, você precisa executar alguma operação em massa em um conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Even though the EditorPartCollection object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo que o objeto EditorPartCollection é somente leitura, você pode fazer alterações programáticas para as propriedades dos controles subjacentes referenciado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância vazia do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPartCollection constructor initializes an empty instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de EditorPartCollection inicializa uma instância vazia da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: This overload of the constructor is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> class in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.CreateEditorParts%2A> method to create an empty collection object.
trans-unit.target: Essa sobrecarga de construtor é usada internamente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>classe em seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.CreateEditorParts%2A>método para criar um objeto de coleção vazia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.CreateEditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The zone then creates instances of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method to add them to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A zona, em seguida, cria instâncias de todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles declarados no modelo de zona filho e usa um método interno para adicioná-los à coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this overload of the EditorPartCollection constructor to create a new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> and add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to it.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode usar essa sobrecarga de construtor EditorPartCollection para criar uma nova instância da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>e adicione <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles ao proprietário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: You must use one of the other overloads for the EditorPartCollection constructor instead.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar uma das outras sobrecargas do construtor EditorPartCollection.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> class by passing in an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> classe, passando um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The EditorPartCollection constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> class and passes in a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de EditorPartCollection inicializa uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>classe e passa em uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: This is one overload of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor that you can use to create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object and add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to it.
trans-unit.target: Isso é uma sobrecarga de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A>construtor que você pode usar para criar um novo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>objeto e adicionar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles ao proprietário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even though the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>criada pelo construtor de instância é somente leitura, você ainda pode acessar o indivíduo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla na coleção por meio de programação e chamar seus métodos e propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: One common scenario for using the EditorPartCollection constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of them.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário comum para usar o construtor EditorPartCollection seria se você deseja executar alguma operação de lote em um conjunto inteiro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles, como alterar o conteúdo, a aparência ou a posição de um grupo relacionado deles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another common scenario for using the EditorPartCollection constructor is developing custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls that you want to associate with a server control, so that users can edit custom properties on your control.
trans-unit.target: Outro cenário comum para usar o construtor EditorPartCollection está desenvolvendo personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles que você deseja associar um controle de servidor, para que os usuários podem editar as propriedades personalizadas do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, your server control must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interface, and as part of that task, it must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nesse cenário, o controle de servidor deve implementar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>interface, e como parte da tarefa, ele deve implementar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>

trans-unit.source: In that method, to enable the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to edit your server control, you must add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> instance, such as an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: Nesse método, para habilitar personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles para editar seu controle de servidor, você deve adicionar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles para um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>de instância, como um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Then you can pass the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object, which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone uses to set up all the controls and begin the editing process.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, você pode passar a coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A>construtor para criar um novo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>do objeto, que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona usa para configurar todos os controles e iniciar o processo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> class by passing in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls, and an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of additional <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> classe, passando um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection"> </xref> coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles e um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>coleção adicionais <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of existing <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>de existentes <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles em uma zona.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls not in a zone, but created programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles não em uma região, mas criados por meio de programação.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se um determinado controle está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control is already in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O método Contains determina se um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle já está no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> being tested for its status as a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> sendo testado para seu status como um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Copia a coleção para uma matriz de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controles.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.
trans-unit.target: O método CopyTo é útil quando você deseja criar um conjunto personalizado que pode conter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>objeto, um subconjunto desses controles ou um subconjunto desses controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> to contain the copied collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> para conter a coleção copiada de controles.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de partida na matriz na qual colocar o conteúdo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Faz referência a uma instância somente leitura, estática vazia da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A static, read-only, empty instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection> reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância estática somente leitura, vazia de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>reduz o uso de memória em casos onde você deseja que uma instância de coleção vazia para retornar o tipo de objeto correto de um método ou comparar a instância com outro objeto, mas não é necessário adicionar membros à instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a posição de um membro específico da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O método IndexOf será útil se você tiver vários <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles em uma página de Web Parts e você precisam localizar um controle específico na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> que é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: An integer that corresponds to the index of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que corresponde ao índice de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um membro específico da coleção de acordo com um identificador exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de um determinado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> em uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> no índice especificado na coleção.
